mdRecord.dcterms:title: Boucher with Electric Co-Op
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Boucher announces a provision of federal funding to a group of people from the Powell Valley Electric Co-Op which includes Ron Flannery, Director of Linwisco Planning Committee and Edgar Bacon, a state senator.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Electricity
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boucher, Rick
